plotScripts.Barchart:
require(ggplot2)
require(e1071)

summaryDf <- data.frame(
    x = levels(as.factor(data$.splitColumnName)),
    y = tapply(data$.valueColumnName, data$.splitColumnName, function(x) .valueAggrType)
)

plt <- ggplot(summaryDf,aes(x = reorder(x,.barSortOrdery),y = y)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity",fill = "green4") +
  labs(x = ".splitColumnName", y = ".valueColumnName") +
  geom_text(aes(label=y)) +
  coord_flip()
plotScripts.Box plot:
require(ggplot2)
plt <- ggplot(data,aes(.categoryColumnName.valueColumnName.binColorColumnName)) +
  geom_jitter(shape = 20.markerColorColumnName) +
  geom_boxplot(lwd = 1,alpha = 0.8) +
  stat_boxplot(geom ='errorbar') +
  stat_summary(fun=mean, geom="point", shape=20, size=5, color="black", fill="black")
plotScripts.Correlation plot:
require(dplyr)
require(ggcorrplot)
data <- data %>% select(.xColumnNames)
corr <- round(cor(data.correlationType), 3)

plt <- ggcorrplot(corr, hc.order = TRUE, lab = TRUE)
